message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which is worth a lot to me. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. Let me know what you think.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  While $9,000 is lower than I'm aiming for, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?  This would allow me to make a fair profit while still giving you a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?

Bob, I understand you're working with a budget.  $9,800 is closer to what I'm looking for, but I can't go that low just yet.  I'm willing to come down to $10,000. This is a fair price that allows me to make a profit while still offering you a good deal. What do you say?
